  • Changelog

    Generate summaries of NHANES

    nhanes_summarize.Rd

    The description should include

    • what is NHANES

    • Who is included in the data to be summarized

    • How is the summary computed

    Usage

    nhanes_summarize(
  outcome,
  exposure = NULL,
  group = NULL,
  years = "last_5",
  pool = FALSE,
  subset_variables = list(),
  subset_values = list(),
  age_wts = NULL
)

    Arguments

    outcome

    (character; length 1; no default) The variable to be summarized.

    exposure

    (character; length 1; default is none)

    group

    (character; length 1; default is none)

    years

    (character; length may vary; default = 'all') Valid options are

    • 'all' (includes all NHANES cycles)

    • 'last_5' (includes the last 5 most recent NHANES cycles)

    • 'most_recent' (include the most recent NHANES cycle)

    pool

    (logical; length 1; default = FALSE)

    subset_variables

    (list; length may vary)

    subset_values

    (list; length must match subset_variables)

    age_wts

    (numeric; length 4; default is none)

    Value

    a data.table with summarized values

    Examples

    
nhanes_summarize("bp_sys_mean")
#>      svy_year statistic estimate std_error ci_lower ci_upper
#>  1: 2009-2010      mean 120.4879 0.4809511 119.5452 121.4305
#>  2: 2011-2012      mean 121.5971 0.6503415 120.3224 122.8717
#>  3: 2013-2014      mean 121.4312 0.3176115 120.8087 122.0537
#>  4: 2015-2016      mean 123.3559 0.4613295 122.4518 124.2601
#>  5: 2017-2020      mean 123.1317 0.3701747 122.4062 123.8572
#>  6: 2009-2010       q25 109.3333 0.4717192 108.6667 110.6667
#>  7: 2009-2010       q50 118.0000 0.4717192 117.3333 119.3333
#>  8: 2009-2010       q75 129.3333 0.6289589 128.6667 131.3333
#>  9: 2011-2012       q25 110.6667 0.4739751 110.0000 112.0000
#> 10: 2011-2012       q50 119.3333 0.4739751 118.6667 120.6667
#> 11: 2011-2012       q75 130.0000 0.4739751 129.3333 131.3333
#> 12: 2013-2014       q25 110.0000 0.3127762 110.0000 111.3333
#> 13: 2013-2014       q50 118.6667 0.3127762 118.6667 120.0000
#> 14: 2013-2014       q75 130.6667 0.4691643 130.0000 132.0000
#> 15: 2015-2016       q25 112.0000 0.4691643 111.3333 113.3333
#> 16: 2015-2016       q50 120.6667 0.6255524 120.0000 122.6667
#> 17: 2015-2016       q75 132.0000 0.4691643 131.3333 133.3333
#> 18: 2017-2020       q25 111.1667 0.2427728 110.8333 111.8333
#> 19: 2017-2020       q50 120.8333 0.2427728 120.5000 121.5000
#> 20: 2017-2020       q75 132.1667 0.5664699 131.1667 133.5000
